briefTitle: Neoadjuvant Hormonal Treatment of Postmenopausal Women Who Have Operable Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The primary endpoint was to compare overall objective response (OR) determined by clinical (palpation) and ultrasound.
